headline: Radian Group Expands Into Multi-Line Specialty Insurance With Inigo
summary: RDN is set to buy Inigo to transform its business from a leading U.S. mortgage insurer to a diversified multi-line specialty insurer.

raw.headline: Radian Group Expands Into Multi-Line Specialty Insurance With Inigo
